/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and white, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their red roofs add a pop of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a sense of tranquility that pervades the image, as if inviting the viewer to take a leisurely stroll down this picturesque street.
